short_summary: Request for Abbreviated Proposals for standalone professional services for Environmental Services in Quebec Region
description: Abbreviated Proposals are invited for a two-year period for professional services, including: Standing Offer Manager, Project Manager, Senior Biologist / Senior Environment Professional, Intermediate Biologist / Intermediate Environment Professional, Senior Technician, Intermediate Technician, Total Classification Rate, Transportation costs, etc. Firms interested in providing services are invited to submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System. The security requirements for the project are identified in the Abbreviated Proposals documents. The maximum value of a call-up is $150,000.00; the estimated maximum value of the Standing Offer is $750,000.00. Further details can be accessed from the MERX website.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### MX-22594732359 | QUENV23

#### Solicitation Details
* **Publication Date:** October 14, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 23, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** November 23, 2022

#### Tender Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from consulting firms to establish a Standing Offer (SO) to provide "as and when required" professional services specific to Department of National Defence (DND) requirements in the Quebec Region.

The services include:

* Standing Offer Manager
* Project Manager
* Senior Biologist/Senior Environment Professional
* Intermediate Biologist/Intermediate Environment Professional
* Senior Technician
* Intermediate Technician
* Total Classification Rate
* Maximum Upset Unit Travel Rate to various locations in Quebec (Bagotville, Valcartier, Saint Jean, Montréal and Farnham)

The SO will be for a period of two (2) years with a maximum estimated value of $750,000.00. Call-ups under the SO are expected to be valued between $ 15,000.00 and $ 100,000.00; the maximum value of a call-up is $ 150,000.00.

#### Tender Requirements

* Tender documents, including the RFAP, are available on the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
* Proponents are required to submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.
* Proponents can obtain contract award results from the DCC Website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (cdc-dcc.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

* Name: Camille Attia
* Email: [camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-715-0564
* Address: 350 Albert St, 19th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3

#### Important Notes
* Tender documents are available on the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
* Fees may apply for accessing the tender documents; please refer to https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more
